DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct demonstrate superiority nateglinide postprandial glucose fluctuation , dyslipidemia , inflammatory status improvement .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Nateglinide v Acarbose Postprandial Glucose Fluctuation , Dyslipidemia , Inflammatory Factors
DOC.criteria: Newly diagnose type 2 diabetes mellitus patient HbA1c > 6.5 < 9.0 % Fasting fingertip capillary blood glucose ( FCBG ) < 9 mmol/L 2 week diet control History acute metabolic complication past 3 month severe diabetic complication severe infection active substance abuse Liver disease Patients oral hypoglycemic drug and/or insulin treatment , corticosteroid treatment within past 4 week Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion apply study .
